description: Observes results for a recognition task within a session.

parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: The ID of the session whose results you want to observe.

parameters.name: sequence_id
parameters.description: The sequence ID of the recognition task whose results you want to observe. Omit the parameter to obtain results either for an ongoing recognition, if any, or for the next recognition task regardless of whether it specifies a sequence ID.

parameters.name: interim_results
parameters.description: If `true`, interim results are returned as a stream of JSON `SpeechRecognitionResults` objects. If `false`, the response is a single `SpeechRecognitionResults` object with final results only.
